bibl.title: Notes on Roman Portraits: I. Varia.
bibl.note: Unpublished notes, 1946-1988. - See pp. 127: 8. Commodus - Sarapis [Cairo, Collection Loukianoff]; - 134, fig. 127: 13. An Extraordinary Galerius. Appendix 1 [some samples of Egyptian portrait heads recarved in Roman times, including a Ptolemaic head: Vienna, Kunsthistorisches Museum, Ag 33a].
